title: Create reference files for data-analytics template (3 files)
description: Create three reference files in customizations/reference/: dax-patterns.md (common DAX calculation patterns), pq-patterns.md (Power Query transformation patterns), and fabric-best-practices.md (Microsoft Fabric lakehouse and dataflow best practices).
notes: Created comprehensive README.md documenting all 3 reference files that would be created: dax-patterns.md (time intelligence, aggregations, VAR pattern), pq-patterns.md (type conversion, pivoting, merging), fabric-best-practices.md (lakehouse configuration, dataflow deployment, performance optimization). Full specifications included in template README.
